text: The University of North London was a university in London, England, from 1992 to 2002. It was merged with London Guildhall University to form London Metropolitan University. Its former campus are now the university's north campus, on Holloway Road and Highbury Grove, Islington. In 1996, the university celebrated its centenary year. ==Other websites== *Internet Archive (University of North London, 17 January 2004) Category:Universities in London Category:1896 establishments in England Category:2002 disestablishments in the United Kingdom Category:2000s disestablishments in England
title: University of North London
